sentence.Network_en: His concubine , Mistress Chen, was visiting with her old mother.
sentence.Network_cn: 陈姨太也回到了她的年老的母亲那里.

sentence.Network_en: " They say your grandfather's old friend Feng is looking for a concubine.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 说是冯老太爷要讨姨太太,冯老太太也到我们公馆里头来过,她说,我们公馆里的丫头都长得不错,向老太爷要一个.

sentence.Network_en: He's nearly sixty. He still wants a concubine? "
sentence.Network_cn: 他六十岁了, 还讨小老婆? ”

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, from Latin concubina, from con- 'with' + cubare 'to lie'

entry.def: In former times, a concubine was a woman who lived with and had a sexual relationship with a man of higher social rank without being married to him.

means.word_mean: 1. a woman who cohabits with an important man

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,"状态,药物等"; 3. "物体"; 4. 表名词,"人或女人"

stems_affixes.word_buile: can狗+ine……的→adj.犬的,犬科的
elephant大象+ine……的→adj.笨拙的,巨大的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 海的,海生的;船舶的,航海的
stems_affixes.word_buile: mari海+ine……的→marine海的,海生的
prist=first首先,最初+ine……的→adj.太古的,纯洁的,新鲜的
route路线,路程+ine……的→adj.常规的,例行的
saturn魔鬼+ine……的→adj.忧郁的,阴沉的
serpent蛇+ine……的→adj.似蛇般绕曲的,蜿蜒的
anti反+febr热+ine状态,药物等→n.[化]乙醯胺苯,退热冰
caffee咖啡+ine状态,药物等→caffeine→咖啡因
fam饿+ine状态,药物等→n.饥荒,饥馑
iod碘+ine状态,药物等→n.碘,碘酒
route路线,路程+ine状态,药物等→routine常走的路线→常规

stems_affixes.value_cn: 凡士林,凡士林的商标名
stems_affixes.word_buile: vasel+ine状态,药物等→由商标名转化而来
con一起+cub躺+ine人或女人→一起躺着的人→情妇
figure形体,蒴像+ine人或女人→figurine小塑像
hero英雄+ine人或女人→n.女英雄;女主角
philist菲力斯人+ine人或女人→n.庸人,市侩

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =lie down,表示"躺"; 2. =barrier,表示躺的"东西,障碍"

stems_affixes.word_buile: con一起+cub躺+ine女人→一起躺着的女人→情妇
cub躺+icle小东西,小地方→躺的小地方
incubate[v.孵化;使发展]+ion状态,过程→n.孵卵期,潜伏期

stems_affixes.value_cn: 孵卵器,早产婴儿保育箱
stems_affixes.word_buile: incubate[v.孵化;使发展]+or物器→n.孵卵器,早产婴儿保育箱
in进入+cub躺+us→[人入睡时]躺在人身体上[或里面]的东西
in向内+cub躺+ate表动词→躺在里面→孵卵

sentences.en: The king had four wives and twenty concubines.
sentences.cn: 这个国王有四个妻子和二十个妃子。
